Objective
:"
" Software engineer position in a software company working in the development and designing micro services for an internet media."
""
"
Programming Experience
"
" • Worked on development and designing of a mobile application using Java Spring framework and React- native framework to provide the music streaming services for the customers."
"
• Lead a group of five members to develop a web application that provided the users information of the current share/stock market and allowed them to purchase it online."
"
• Worked on rewriting the old legacy codes with new technology for an online e-commerce site."
""
"
Analytical skills
"
" • Researched on the application of big data to predict the customer behavior when a new cellphone is released."
"
• Built a personal project using the block chain technology for the consumers to know about the agricultural products."
" Community Involvement
• Worked as the president of Association of Computer Machinery in 2019 and was the member from 2017-2021."
"
• Served as the secretary of the Nepalese Student Association at Southeastern in 2020."
""
"
